title: Minnetonka Sheepskin-Lined Suede Mid-Calf Boots Women's 8 Tan
listperfectly_description:
Plush Minnetonka sheepskin boots built for crisp mornings, cabin weekends, and cold errands.

Supple tan suede leather upper with genuine sheepskin lining for warmth, a classic mid-calf silhouette, and a flexible rubber outsole for everyday winter wear. Easy pull-on design with a relaxed, boho-leaning look that pairs effortlessly with denim or leggings.

Included in the sale are the following items:
- Women's Boots (pair)

Approximate measurements are listed below.
- Outsole length (heel-to-toe): ~10.5 in (26.7 cm)
- Outsole width (widest): ~3.9 in (9.9 cm)
- Insole length (heel to toe): ~10.0 in (25.4 cm)
- Insole width (ball area): ~3.6 in (9.1 cm)
- Heel height: ~0.75 in (1.9 cm)
- Shaft height (from outsole): ~9.5 in (24.1 cm)
- Shaft opening (circumference): ~14.0 in (35.6 cm)
- Weight (pair): ~2.5 lb (1.1 kg)

Photos show condition and measurements; ask if you need a specific angle or detail confirmed.
